backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the KPI/program tracking backend, defining data types (Program, KPI, TeamMember, etc.) and CRUD operations for programs, KPIs, team members, agendas, and user profiles with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two ProfileSetupModal-related features (inline error handling and required name field with Principal ID fallback) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON dictionary providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference document for the frontend codebase structure and component responsibilities.
frontend/.deploy-trigger: A static marker file used to force CI/CD rebuild and redeploy without making functional code changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart colors, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'Program Timeline and Team KPI Tracking Application' and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing the authentication and profile-setup flow: shows loading screens during identity/profile initialization, renders LoginPage when unauthenticated, ProfileSetupModal when no profile exists, and Dashboard otherwise.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard overview component that computes and displays aggregate metrics, division performance (for 5 divisions), and program/KPI status charts using Recharts with data fetched from backend query hooks.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable AlertDialog component for confirming delete actions, accepting title, description, and onConfirm/onClose callbacks with Cancel and Delete buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer displaying copyright year, a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking, and a gradient background with an accent-colored heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky app header displaying the SHQ logo/title, a theme toggle button, and a user dropdown menu with profile info and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Modal dialog form for creating or editing a KPI, handling field validation, date conversion, and submission via create/update mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: KPI management tab that lists all KPIs in a filterable/searchable table, with role-based edit and delete controls for admins and coordinators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: First-time profile setup modal that prompts a logged-in user to enter their display name, saves it to the backend, and handles error messaging in Indonesian.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Renders a small color-coded legend showing the three calendar event categories: Programs, Team Agenda, and KPI Deadlines.
Utility functions for the calendar: provides category color mappings and computes per-day counts of programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines for an array of dates.
React class-based error boundary for the calendar tab that catches render errors and displays a fallback UI with a retry button.
Renders a single calendar day cell showing the date number and colored indicator bars for programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines present on that day.
A slide-in Sheet panel that lists all programs active on a selected date, showing status, priority, and key details for each, with click-through to program detail.
A toggle control with two buttons allowing the user to switch the calendar grid between 'comfortable' and 'compact' density modes.
A button group that lets users switch the calendar between month, week, day, and agenda view modes.
A right-side Sheet drawer that displays full details of a selected program including status, priority, timeline, progress, and an optional edit button.
Provides utility functions to filter a list of programs by division, PIC, status, and priority, and to count programs active on a specific day.
Exports helper functions that return display label and CSS class/variant configurations for program status and priority values.
Renders a 14-day agenda list grouped by day, showing programs, team agenda items, and KPI deadlines with badges and click handlers.
Displays all programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines for a single selected day in a list format with status and priority badges.
Renders a full-month calendar grid with weekday headers, computing per-day category counts and delegating each cell to the DayCell component.
Renders a 7-day week grid view, computing per-day category counts and displaying each day using the DayCell component.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Full-featured program calendar tab supporting month, week, day, and agenda views with filtering by division/PIC/status/priority, reminder toggles, and program detail/edit drawers.
React error boundary wrapper for ProgramCalendarTab that catches render errors, displays a fallback UI, and invalidates relevant React Query caches on reset.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: A dialog form component for creating and editing programs, handling fields like name, description, division, person-in-charge, dates, status, priority, and progress with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: A card component that displays a program's name, description, status, priority, dates, and unit, with optional edit and delete action buttons.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: A tab view that lists all programs with search, filter (status/priority/division), and sort capabilities, plus controls for viewing, editing, and deleting programs via dialogs and a detail drawer.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: A searchable combobox component for selecting a related program from a list, using a Popover with Command input and checkmark indicators.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: A reports tab that displays filtered programs and KPIs with options to export data as CSV, supporting filters by team, division, and priority.
frontend/src/components/team/ManagerSele: A select dropdown for choosing a team member's manager, filtering out the current member and supporting an explicit 'no manager' option.
frontend/src/components/team/PhotoUrlPre: Shows a live avatar preview for a given HTTPS photo URL, indicating load success or failure with appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamFunctio: Renders a selectable button node for a team member displaying their avatar, name, and role, used in a functional org-chart view.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberC: Renders a card UI for a team member with avatar display, photo upload functionality (with progress tracking), and optional edit/delete action buttons. Handles authentication checks before allowing avatar changes.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberD: Displays a slide-out Sheet panel with detailed information about a selected team member, including their avatar, role, division, manager, and direct reports.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamStructu: Renders a single node in a hierarchical org chart tree, showing a team member's avatar, name, role, and division badge, and recursively renders child nodes with connector lines.
Displays a functional organizational chart grouped by division, with a root/director node at the top, hierarchy warnings, and a details panel that opens on member selection.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: A dialog form for creating and editing team members, including fields for name, division, role, manager, and avatar photo upload with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: A tab view for managing team members with search, card/structure view toggle, and add/edit/delete actions gated by user role and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/TopPillNav.tsx: Renders a pill-style tab navigation bar with links to Dashboard, Calendar, Program, KPI, Team, Laporan, and optionally Pengguna (admin only).
Admin-only tab that displays a table of all user profiles with controls to update roles and approve/reject users using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and returns an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
Custom hook that periodically checks programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines to show toast reminders at 24-hour and 3-hour intervals before each event, using deduplication to avoid repeat notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: A React hook that tracks whether a CSS media query matches, updating state reactively on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, admin checks, programs, KPIs, team members, and agenda items via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base/components/utilities and a purple-blue-green OKLCH color theme with light/dark mode CSS variables and custom gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page component that renders a tabbed layout with sections for overview, calendar, programs, KPIs, team, reports, and admin user management.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component that provides Internet Identity authentication with a styled card UI showing login status and feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/imageNormalize.ts: Client-side utility that normalizes image files for upload by resizing, compressing, and converting them to JPEG/PNG via canvas, with HEIC rejection and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Deprecated utility for uploading images to ImgBB with client-side normalization and XHR progress tracking. Kept for backward compatibility; team member photos should use backend blob storage instead.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Manages deduplication of calendar reminders using localStorage, tracking shown reminders with a 48-hour expiry and auto-cleaning expired records.
frontend/src/utils/safeBrowserStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers around localStorage for reading and writing JSON and string values, with error handling and SSR fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/teamFunctionalStructu: Utility functions for processing team member data: collecting all members from a hierarchy tree, grouping members by division, and sorting members by name.
frontend/src/utils/teamHierarchy.ts: Builds a parent-child hierarchy tree from a flat list of team members and detects issues like circular references, self-references, and missing managers.
frontend/src/utils/teamMemberAvatar.ts: Derives a displayable image URL for a team member avatar, supporting backend ExternalBlob objects and legacy URL strings.
frontend/src/utils/teamMemberAvatarUploa: Uploads a team member avatar to backend blob storage by normalizing the image, converting it to a Uint8Array, and wrapping it in an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and helpers to clear sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/src/utils/urlValidation.ts: Provides simple validators to check whether a string is a valid HTTP/HTTPS or HTTPS-only URL.
frontend/src/utils/userDisplayName.ts: Derives a user's display name and initials from their profile, falling back to a shortened principal ID or default string when no name is available.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended border radii, box shadows, gradient backgrounds, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state, known bugs, existing features, and new feature requests for a web app using Internet Identity authentication. Focuses on fixing critical login/registration bugs related to admin role assignment, profile save errors, and data persistence across redeployments.
